# Akademiska examina

```{r}
library(tibble)
tribble(
  ~ What, ~ Year, ~ Institution, ~ Where,
  "\\href{https://portal.research.lu.se/en/publications/on-user-involvement-in-research-on-ageing-and-health}{Doktorsexamen i medicinsk vetenskap}", "2023", "", "Lunds universitet",
  "Magisterexamen i kognitionsvetenskap", "2013", "", "Linköpings universitet"
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(What, Year, Institution, Where,
                   .protect = FALSE)
```
